mapper.sql: tssrs.ID, tssrs.LANE_NUM, tssrs.VEHICLE_ID, tssrs.TAIL_VEHICLE_ID, tssrs.VEH_SPEED, tssrs.IDENTIFY_TYPE, tssrs.VEH_FEATURE_CODE, tssrs.FACE_FEATURE_CODE, tssrs.OP_TIME, tssrs.DIRECTION
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_SVID_RES_SENDER_${year} ( ID, LANE_NUM, VEHICLE_ID, TAIL_VEHICLE_ID, VEH_SPEED, IDENTIFY_TYPE, VEH_FEATURE_CODE, FACE_FEATURE_CODE, OP_TIME, DIRECTION ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tailVehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehSpeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identifyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_SVID_RES_SENDER_${year} ( ID, LANE_NUM, VEHICLE_ID, TAIL_VEHICLE_ID, VEH_SPEED, IDENTIFY_TYPE, VEH_FEATURE_CODE, FACE_FEATURE_CODE, OP_TIME, DIRECTION )
SELECT #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.laneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tailVehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehSpeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.identifyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vehFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.faceFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.direction,jdbcType=INTEGER} FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_SHAR_SVID_RES_SENDER_${year}
LANE_NUM = #{laneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAIL_VEHICLE_ID = #{tailVehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEH_SPEED = #{vehSpeed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{identifyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VEH_FEATURE_CODE = #{vehFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE_FEATURE_CODE = #{faceFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TIME = #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DIRECTION = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}
WHERE ID = #{id}

update.foreach:

OP_TIME = #{item.opTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

WHERE ID = #{item.id};
